text: This obsoletes IRM 4.18.4, Exam Offer-in-Compromise, Combination Offers.

This IRM provides instructions and guidance to examiners considering a combination offer in compromise ﬁled before July 16, 2006. All offers ﬁled before that date have been resolved. Combination Offers are no longer accepted. Obsoleting the offer was not followed up with a
IRM 4.18.4, Combination Offers, dated January 4, 2011 is obsolete as of the date of this
